name: MyHusband
0:
”Alexa, ask my husband if I can go shopping”
”Alexa, ask my husband if I can buy a new car”
”Alexa, ask my husband if I can upgrade my wedding ring”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my husband
des: Use this skill to get the answers you always wanted from your husband. Just ask and it's approved! You can ask "My Husband" for permission to buy things, go place, or do activities. Have you always been told "no" by your husband? Now you can finally hear "yes" as relayed by Alexa. Watch him stunned to hear Alexa approving things on his behalf! He won't be able to argue because Alexa doesn't lie!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
